  • Assembling cabinet components such as doors, drawers, shelves, and frames.
  • Ensuring accuracy and quality in measurements and assembly processes.

  • Using personal protective equipment (PPE) as required.
  • Reporting safety hazards or concerns to supervisors promptly.
  • Collaborating with colleagues and team members to meet production goals and deadlines.
  • Communicating effectively with supervisors and other departments regarding workflow and production schedules.
  • Assisting coworkers and providing support as needed.
  • Working efficiently to maximize productivity while maintaining quality standards.
  • Identifying opportunities for process improvements and suggesting solutions.
  • Meeting or exceeding production targets and goals.
  • Contributing to the production of high-quality cabinets that meet or exceed customer expectations. - Addressing customer concerns or feedback related to product quality or performance.
  • Keep a clean and organized workspace at all times.

  • Ability to meet deadlines, exhibit great attention to detail, and communicate professionally.

  • ProCraft will train to consistently meet/exceed production standards.
